text: Consider the following process execution diagram. P2 P6 O— o‘ooa P3 P4 The arrows represent dependencies between the processes. Initially process P1 starts. P2 and P3 can start their execution after completion of P1. P4, P5 and P6 can start their execution after the completion of both P2 and P3. P7 can start its execution after completion of P5 and P4. Minimum how many counting semaphores are required to achieve this synchronization among the processes?
